attributes.additional_details: None of the 'trending' petitions have ANYTHING to do with taking 'people power' action against the appalling way this country us currently being governed.  It is EXTREMELY difficult to believe that the majority of the 60-odd million people of this country are more concerned, and prepared to sign a petition, about how rabbits are treated, than sign something which will maybe act towards putting the governance of this land back into HONEST hands, regardless of the political hue and aspirations of the owner of those hands.  Honesty is NOT something ANY of our current electeds can be accused of.
